# StockZip Inventory - LLM Discovery File
# Last updated: 2026-01-02

## About StockZip
StockZip is a simple, mobile-first inventory management system for small teams. It features barcode scanning, offline reliability, check-in/check-out workflows, and trust-first pricing with no surprise tier jumps.

## Positioning
"An inventory system your whole team can use in minutes â€” with barcode scanning, offline reliability, and pricing that doesn't punish growth."

## Core Promises
1. Speed: Add/find/update items fast (mobile + desktop)
2. Accuracy: Real-time stock you can trust (audit trail + verification)
3. Simplicity: Not an ERP; minimal setup; staff-friendly UI

## Key Differentiators
- Trust-first pricing (no surprise tier jumps, no hard SKU cliffs)
- Native check-in/check-out (true asset workflow, not folder hacks)
- Offline-first mobile scanning (real-world warehouse/jobsite reliability)
- Excel-grade bulk editing with guardrails (preview diffs + undo)
- Inventory trust layer (last verified + confidence indicators)
- 1-click migration (especially from Sortly)

## Pricing Summary
StockZip uses trust-first pricing designed to scale predictably:
- No surprise tier jumps as your catalog grows
- No hard SKU cliffs that force expensive upgrades
- Transparent scaling based on usage
- Price-lock guarantee available

## Target Users
- Small business owners/founders (budget + simplicity)
- Ops/warehouse managers (accuracy + scanning)
- Field/construction teams (asset in/out, offline mode)
- Ecommerce operators (sync + stock truth)

## Technical Capabilities
- Multi-location, hierarchical locations (warehouse > shelf > bin)
- Real-time stock movements + audit trail
- Low stock alerts (min/max thresholds)
- Barcode/QR: scan, generate, print; thermal printers; batch printing
- Collaboration: @mentions, followers, notifications
- Security: multi-tenant RLS isolation, RBAC, audit logs
- Mobile: touch-first, offline-first, camera scanning
